title: Core types, parsers, graph builder, and test harness
description: Create the foundation: VaultNote interface, VaultGraph type (Map<string,VaultNote>), parseFrontmatter() to extract YAML between --- fences, extractWikilinks() regex for [[slug]] and [[slug|display]], ensureVaultDirs() to create ~/.pi/vault/ with concepts/projects/patterns/references/log/ subdirs, buildGraph() to scan all .md files and compute links+backlinks. Create tests/test-vault.ts using npx tsx with tests for: frontmatter parsing (valid, missing fields, no frontmatter), wikilink extraction (single, multiple, display text, nested brackets), graph building (links, backlinks, orphan detection). Follow brain.ts import patterns. All pure functions exported for testing.

title: Extension skeleton + capture/read/write actions with verbatim guard
description: Wire up vault.ts as a pi extension: export default function(pi), ensure vault dirs on load, create _index.md (root MOC with frontmatter type:moc) and _inbox.md (empty capture buffer) if missing. Register 'vault' tool with StringEnum actions [capture,read,write,status,list]. Implement: (1) capture -- append timestamped entry to _inbox.md with source/context header and --- separator. (2) read -- read note by slug, return full content + computed backlinks from graph. (3) write -- create/update note by slug, validate with verbatim trap guard (reject if missing frontmatter, missing '## Connections' section, or <1 wikilink -- except type=log), place in correct dir by type param, update 'updated' field, rebuild graph after write. Add tests for capture (appends correctly), write (correct directory, updated field), and verbatim guard (reject missing connections, allow logs).

title: Status/list actions + /vault slash command
description: Implement remaining actions and slash command: (1) status action -- return total notes by type, orphan count (notes with no incoming links, excluding MOCs and index files), inbox item count (count --- separators in _inbox.md), avg links per note. (2) list action -- list notes with optional type and query filters, return slug/title/type/link-count/updated for each. (3) Register /vault slash command that shows status dashboard via ctx.ui.notify(). Run full test suite to verify all actions work together.
